Disease.Name: GAUCHER DISEASE TYPE I
Disease.Summary: 1:600 (>350 patients) ;autosomal recessive ;type I is mainly found in Ashkenazic Jews ;3 types: ;- chronic/adult (I) MIM 230800 ;- acute/infantile(II) MIM 230900 ;- juvenile (III) MIM 231000;- cardiovascular (IIIC) MIM 231005

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: bleeding tendencies, hemorrhages / bleeding tendencies, hemorrhage

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: pain, bones or joints / pain bones
symtomp.category: GENERAL TOPICS | SKELATAL DEFECT | SKELETAL DEFECT
CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM | LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM
